channel.title: How do I get started?
channel.description:
Hey guys. I wanted to start my own private server and code stuff in MYSELF.
Problem is, I'm a noob. I've never done shit and I need to know exactly where to start. I want a perfect private server, that later on I will make forums for and make it go big.
What's a good source/client/base/etc...?
JUST POST EVERYTHING I NEED TO START AND I WILL LOVE YOU:)
I'm not trying to start 100% scratch. I want atleast basic things coded in.

item.title: How do I get started?
item.dc:creator: @Dclawrushz Dclawrushz
item.description:
@Dclawrushz wrote:

If your a beginner I could set everything up for you. So you have no troubles coding the server to your ip! Plus look at the server tutorials it will tell you how!

Read full topic

item.title: How do I get started?
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

Well, if you look in the tutorial section i believe there is a tut stickied on this.

Read full topic
